articles.author: Kalhan Rosenblatt
articles.title: Trump extends TikTok ban deadline by another 90 days - NBC News
articles.description: President Donald Trump has extended the deadline for TikTok’s parent company, ByteDance, to sell the short-form video app to an American owner by another 90 days
articles.content:
President Donald Trump has extended the deadline for TikToks parent company, ByteDance, to sell the short-form video app to an American owner by another 90 days.

articles.title: The island city where Juneteenth was born - BBC
articles.description: One hundred and sixty years after word reached Galveston, Texas, that enslaved African Americans were now free, the city is honouring Juneteenth year round.
articles.content:
Galveston, Texas celebrates itself as the birthplace of Juneteenth (Credit: Getty Images)
